CustomField.description: Indicates whether the billable column on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. When true, the column is hidden and the billable checkbox defaults to selected. The default value is false.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether the billable column on the Timecard Entry page is hidden. When true, the column is hidden and the billable checkbox defaults to selected. The default value is false.
CustomField.label: Hide Billable Column
